Description:
Fabulous land with unlimited potential
Land is an increasing commodity and this flat rectangular block measuring 840m2 (approx.) could not be better positioned. Located centrally yet in a quiet residential pocket and only minutes to Dandenong CBD, Plaza and Market. Existing house can be utilised for rent while you are obtaining plans and permits. Potential to build 3-4 dwellings gives potential developer plenty to look forward to. Finished products will be in high demand whether offered for sale or rent in this convenient location. Potential and results will only depend on your imagination. An opportunity that is not to be missed.
Insights: 107 Herbert Street, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2017 and 123 other 3 bedroom house in Dandenong have recently been sold.

Description:
Jump into the market
Standalone opportunities like this rarely exist anymore, so when a possibility like this presents itself, it’s important to snap it up with both hands!
Conveniently located close to Dandenong, schools, recreation facilities, Princes Highway, as well as there being public transport conveniently located outside the front door, this lovely standalone 2 bedroom property is ideal for first home buyers or someone who sees a wonderful investment opportunity. The 2 bedroom home has been well maintained, 2 living areas, plus a spacious back yard.
Upon entry you'll walk into the spacious lounge room complete with split system air conditioner and wall furnace. From here you can move into the kitchen / dining area with the delightful wooden, herringbone floor. The kitchen is ideal for cooking up a storm and perfectly positioned in relation to the rest of the home.
The bathroom is enormous and can easily cater for a number of people living in the property. Both bedrooms are spacious and come with built in robes.
The garage is just right for one car and there’s access to the expansive back yard, significant for a property of this size.
Get onto this property, as opportunities like this don’t last.
Insights: 2/29 Potter Street, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Fully Updated Unit in Brilliant Location!
This recently renovated unit is in a quiet location but so so central to everything. It features:
. Two good sized bedrooms with robes
. Complex has been fully refurbished including new gutters and eaves.
. Single car space quietly to the rear of the building.
. Ground floor with no walkup.
The property is currently owner occupied but would rent for approximately $250 to $260 per week.
Additionally the property has been repainted,, trims replaced, and new window furnishings installed , and updated shower enclosure.
Location is second to none: walking distance to Dandenong station, Dandenong central shopping, and bus routes at the front of the building.
Perfect for downsizers or investors, the unit won't last long!

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED UNIT IN CENTRAL LOCATION
Immaculately presented and superbly renovated is this spacious unit ideally located within minutes to public transport, primary & secondary schools, Dandenong hospital, Dandenong station, Dandenong Chisholm TAFE and all the shopping options that central Dandenong has on offer.
Boasting a large formal lounge and a stunning kitchen with an abundance of cabinetry, quality stone bench tops, stainless-steel gas cooktop, electric oven, range-hood and dishwasher.
Consisting 2 spacious bedrooms providing ample accommodation for all families and all serviced by a newly renovated bathroom and two toilets.
Features:
2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes
3 separate reverse cycle split system air conditioners
Stone bench tops
New kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher
New bathroom
2 separate toilets
Outdoor alfresco area
Single lock up garage with remote access
Move right in and enjoy a sensational modern home whilst also being a solid investment within an area that's proven for capital growth.
*Please note, photo ID is to be presented upon inspection.

Description:
Invest or Redevelop, The Choice is Yours
This is a well located 3 bedroom family home being close to all major highways, the Yarraman train station, East Link and recreational walking/bike riding tacks. Featuring, beautifully polished floorboards and BIR’s throughout the bedrooms, 2 x reverse-cycle split system air conditioners, an original kitchen with gas up right stove and walk-in pantry. The home also provides a large carpeted living area (with gas wall heater), a spacious meals area, single bathroom with a separate shower room and 2 toilets. The rear of the home offers a secure backyard with a low maintenance garden and single lock up garage. A great opportunity for first home buyers or investors. Large block of land with 31-meter frontage will appeal to visionaries willing to take on challenge building units/townhouses (STCA).
Contact: Theo Maric on 0411 410 744
Auction: Saturday 16th December 2017 at 1:30pm, On Site
Terms: 10% Deposit, Balance in 30-60 Days
TO VIEW THE CONSUMER AFFAIRS DUE DILIGENCE CHECKLIST PLEASE VISIT http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
MOVE IN OR INVEST
This is a fully updated large unit of only three with no active Body Corporate in an excellent condition.
This neatly presented brick veneer home boasts a bright and spacious design with only a short walk to schools, public transport, local shops and Dandenong Central Shopping Centre, parks, hospital and a short drive to access Monash Freeway and Eastlink, offering the perfect opportunity for families or investors alike.
Comprising two large bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, separate toilet, large kitchen with meals area, separate living room, laundry, an entry hall and front porch. Outdoors there is a single garage with roller door and ample space at the side and back.
There are floating timber floors and tiles in kitchen and wet areas, a good size kitchen with lots of cupboard space, with gas cooking and plenty of bench space.
Additional features to complete this family residence include, gas ducted heating and reverse air-conditioner. Do not miss the opportunity to secure this perfect home/investment in the most convenient location!
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. We do not accept any responsibility to any person for its accuracy and do no more than pass it on. All interested parties are advised to carry out their own investigations, and should make and rely upon their own enquiries in order to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate.

Description:
An Ideal Way to Begin, Downsize or Invest
Privately hidden to the rear, this recently partially renovated, two bedroom, one bathroom single level unit sets an impressive precedent in low maintenance living. Recently painted and boasting a brand new bathroom and gleaming polished floorboards throughout makes a tempting prospect for the downsizer, investor or first home buyer.
Raise your comfort level with this contemporary revamp and bring your own sense of style to the open plan living/dining/kitchen, wrap around courtyard, built in robes to bedrooms, gas wall heater, ceiling fans, single car garage and shed.
Located within close proximity to Dandenong Hospital, specialist medical clinics, Dandenong Primary and High School, Chisholm TAFE, buses and Dandenong Central.

Description:
Young, modern tri-level townhouse - 2 bathrooms!
Escape the ordinary with this near new, tri-level townhouse situated in the heart of Dandenong. Unique in design and offering a low maintenance life style making it perfectly suited to the owner-occupier or smart investor. 3 levels of quality, ground floor comprises garage with internal entry, spacious kitchen with adjoining meals/ living area, laundry, powder room and private courtyard with water tank. Second floor features master bedroom with robes and ensuite, large living area and balcony. Third floor boasts elegant A frame ceilings, large open study/ living area, generous bedroom with robes and ensuite. With a fully functional floorplan and all of the benefits of being located within walking distance to Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Market, train station, buses and schools, this townhouse is the epitome of convenience. Move in immediately or lease immediately with income upon settlement.

Description:
Position-Perfect Development Site
This classic 3-bedroom cream brick veneer home is situated in an established street opposite the Pioneer Memorial Gardens and just a stones throw from bustling Dandenong Market, Dandenong shopping centre and a host of amenities, including Dandenong Hospital.
The property has 3 bedrooms and the 2 bathrooms each have a shower and WC. The kitchen has gas cooking, wooden cabinetry and ample bench space. The big lounge and dining room both have dual aspect windows overlooking the front and side, and the lounge has a space heater and a split system. Theres also a double carport on the side of the property.
But with a land size of approximately 747 square metres, this property is ripe for development (SCTA) and its in Residential Growth Zone R1 (RGZ1).
An unbeatable location and great development potential in a residential growth zone make this a must-see property.

Description:
Dandenongs hidden gem sitting on a 586sqm block!
Well-built and impressively maintained throughout its life, this cute home sitting on a generous 585sqm (approx.) perfect rectangular block featuring a gorgeous brick veneer provides plenty of versatility whether it be the perfect family home, start a small business and or for investment. With light paint tones and carpets throughout, the home features three well sized bedrooms, a study, one bathroom, one toilet and kitchen with meals area adjoining to the very generous family and lounge area, a separate laundry and a double garage. Additionally, keep warm during the winter months, as this home is equipped with gas heating in living area as well as a column heater in the family area. Also featuring a large backyard that is easy to maintain featuring a beautiful lawn that would make the perfect outdoor play area for kids and pets.
A location such as this one is high in demand being in such a premium pocket of Dandenong with useful amenities within a stone's throw away such as from Dandenong South Primary School, Dandenong Station, Dandenong CBD, Dandenong Bypass/Eastlink, public transport and recreational facilities. This home is all but ready for you to make it your own! So be sure to inspect this hidden gem before the chance to secure it is gone!

Description:
Stop! You’ve Just Found the Perfect Family Home.
Guaranteed to please, fully renovated inside and out and nestled in a quiet court location, this is the perfect place to call home or ideal investment.
Finished in modern tones and oozing quality and style throughout, features a great layout with 2 living areas, the spacious lounge and separate meals / family rooms, 3 generous bedrooms with BIRS,’ master with ensuite and sizeable WIR, sensational kitchen with s/steel appliances, 2 gleaming bathrooms, 2 toilets ,private and secure backyard with concreted entertaining area and plenty of grass for the kids to play, nice wide driveway with plenty of off street parking plus garage with workshop area & rear drive through access surrounded by gorgeous landscaped gardens front and rear. Freshly painted with new carpets and LED lights fitted, extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and combination of manual / electric shutters on all windows.
A standout home in this tightly held location, close to Dandenong Train Station and CBD, easy access to Dandenong Bypass, Eastlink and other major arterials, nothing to do here but move in and enjoy, you’ll regret it if you miss out on this one!

Description:
Central Apartment Living
Set only minutes away from Dandenong Central with dining, retail, parks and markets all within close proximity, this bright, spacious, two bedroom apartment will appeal to owner occupiers and investors alike.
Much more than your standard apartment, this secure apartment blends it's private, peaceful position with lifestyle practicality.
Filled with plenty of storage, the ideally designed floor plan features an entry hall, light filled kitchen with gas cooking and plenty of cupboard space, dining/family area, an inviting living room adjoining balcony with views, two double bedrooms with built in robes and a balcony off the main bedroom, bathroom and a separate powder room complete the home.
Extras include split system air conditioning, carpets throughout with tiles to wet areas, window furnishings, security entry and a car space gives you everything you need.
Only a hop, skip and a jump to Dandenong Market, Plaza, medical clinics and buses, everything you need for easy living is at your doorstep.
Currently rented to ideal tenants on a periodic lease at $1,434 pcm, purchase as an investment or purchase to live in, either way, you cannot go wrong here.

Description:
Superbly Renovated Extra Large Unit
Here is the opportunity to take your first step into the property market, downsize in style, or add a quality piece to your portfolio with this fully renovated home. Sitting in a quiet complex with direct access to the parklands of Gardiner Reserve this versatile home gives you the features and comforts of a newly appointed property with the freedom of space and flexibility. Featuring:
- Three large bedrooms each with BIRs,
- Brand new modern kitchen and meals area with stone benchtops, Blum cabinets, Bosch gas cook-top, oven and dishwasher,
- Fully renovated modern bathroom with brand new features and floor to ceiling tiling, combined with separate toilet and laundry.
- Brivis ducted heating and split system air-conditioning,
- Landscaped low maintenance front and rear yard.
This superb property also features new flooring throughout, LED down lights, new laundry with wall to wall benchtop and cupboard storage, tiled wet areas, new electrical switch board, new front and rear entrance doors, new security doors, new fly screens, secure garage with roller door and fully reconditioned roof, resprayed and repointed.
Close to Eastlink and the Monash Freeway, this home is central to all facilities including schools, hospitals and the convenience of Dandenong Central. This versatile home has been renovated to the highest standards with no detailed spared meaning there's nothing to spend to enjoy the comforts and style of modern living.
Insights: 9/38A King George Parade, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
CENTRAL LOCATION WITH EXPONENTIAL POTENTIAL!
LJ Hooker proudly presents this spectacular opportunity for all astute investors and developers looking to add to their portfolio. Sitting on a whopping 808m2 approx of prime soil. The choice is yours, develop 3-4 dwellings, multiple apartments or medical suites STCA. Whether short term or a long term investment you cannot go wrong in this central location!
Presenting 3 bedrooms with BIR, Lounge, family area, lovely kitchen with gas cooking, s/s appliances, dishwasher and an abundance of cupboard space. The main bathroom and laundry make up the interior of this home.
This lovely home also comes with a large remote-controlled garage with its own gaming room and full bar making up the perfect man cave.
Features of this home include: gas heater, woodfire heater, evaporative cooling, shed, pergola for all year-round entertainment and much more.
Located within a short walking distance to Dandenong Shopping Centre, Dandenong Market, Hospital, Local schools, Monash Freeway, Public Transport, Recreational Facilities and so much more. Do not miss out on this excellent opportunity in the ever-growing mecca called Dandenong!!
Auction: 09/12/17 @2:30pm
Location: On site
Settlement: 60/90 Days
Deposit: 5%-10%
Call Ben Jusufi or Burak Gul for any further information!
*PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*

Description:
FIRST PRIZE!
Superbly maintained 3 bedroom home (with 2 living areas) in a picturesque garden setting. Convenience plus court location for the position buyers. Easy walking distance to multiple Schools including St Gerards, Lyndale Greens Primary, Lyndale Secondary College. Also easy access to local strip shopping centres, Monash Freeway, Eastlink with bus stop at nearby Gladstone Road.
Also comes with a good sized allotment, ample off street parking with a garage and carport.
A very attractive proposition for the home buyer.
SEE YOU THERE!

Description:
IMPECCABLY PRESENTED TOP QUALITY RESIDENCE!
Forget everything you've seen up until now! This property exudes quality and was built to the owners' own discerning standard.
Comprising three spacious bedrooms with an ensuite to the master and a centrally located bathroom to cater for everyone else. An open welcoming kitchen with top quality appliances and space to sit around and discuss the day's issues.
The large living area overlooks both the kitchen and the sensational outdoor living areas.
A fully enclosed alfresco with removable panels for year round entertaining, built in benches/storage cupboards and then more decking for when the grandkids come to visit so you can keep them out of the house while still being a part of their lives.
More? What about a garage with direct access and remote door, electric gates and brick fencing at the front for total security plus electric shutters all round so you can lock up and go on holidays any time you want. This list just goes on
YOU NEED TO SEE THIS HOME!
